mapper.select:
select ,
from t_parking p inner join t_residence r on p.residence_id=r.residence_id

mapper.update:
update t_parking
saleContract_id = #{salecontractId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LeaseContract_id = #{leasecontractId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
residence_id = #{residenceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
p_number = #{pNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`state` = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
types = #{types,jdbcType=INTEGER},
managemen = #{managemen,jdbcType=INTEGER},
preSale = #{presale,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
prePrice = #{preprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
`position` = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area = #{area,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where parking_id = #{parkingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_parking set saleContract_id = #{salecontractId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LeaseContract_id = #{leasecontractId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, residence_id = #{residenceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, p_number = #{pNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, types = #{types,jdbcType=INTEGER}, managemen = #{managemen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, preSale = #{presale,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, prePrice = #{preprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, `position` = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where parking_id = #{parkingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
